name: Pugpi
description:
My uni project
You play as Pugpi, an aspiring musician. He and his friend Cherupi participated in Song Contest and even got to the finals! But evil metal band "Puppys" kidnapped Pugpi and left somewhere in space.
Now he has to find his way back and not to be late for the contest. 

ESC to exit game
R to restart

LEFT mouse button - asteroids
RIGHT mouse button - stars
